title: Viscera.Cleanup.Detail.Shadow.Warrior-HI2U
description:
HI2U!

Viscera Cleanup Detail: Shadow Warrior (c) RuneStorm

Release date : 12th of October, 2013
Protection   : Steam
Type         : Action, Indie
Size         : 36 x 15 mb

Note:
~~~~~
This is a standalone mini game released as a DLC on Steam for people who
bought Shadow Warrior.

Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~
After the battle is over, someone has to cleanup the mess! Introducing Viscera
Cleanup Detail: Shadow Warrior from RuneStorm, a unique crossover mini-game
that combines the worlds of Viscera Cleanup Detail and Shadow Warrior. Step
into the rubber soled shoes of the hapless janitor tasked with cleaning up Lo
Wangs mess after a devastating katana battle in the collectors temple from
Shadow Warrior. Mop up pools of blood, dispose of body parts, and get the
collectors gallery of antiques in tip top shape as quick as possible!
Successfully clean the entire temple and collect all the scattered cash to
unlock two Steam achievements!

Install:
~~~~~~~
Unpack the release, mount the .iso, install the game, and copy over the crack
from the Crack dir to your BinariesWin32 dir. Enjoy.
